text: Calcatodrillia is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae,. ==Species== Species within the genus Calcatodrillia include: * Calcatodrillia chamaeleon Kilburn, 1988 * Calcatodrillia hololeukos Kilburn, 1988 ==References== * R.N. Kilburn (1988), Turridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda) of southern Africa and Mozambique. Part 4. Subfamilies Drilliinae, Crassispirinae and Strictispirinae; Ann. Natal Mus. Vol. 29(1) Pages 167-320 ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Calcatodrillia
